casebody.data:
GOLDSTON & HARRINGTON
v.
STATE & EASLEY. No. 328PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 26, 2006. R. Daniel Boyce, G. Eugene Boyce, Philip R. Isley, Anthony M. Brannon, Raleigh, for Goldston and Harrington. John Maddrey, Norma S. Harrell, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for State of NC. Pamela B. Cashwell, Jeanette Doran Brooks, Julia F. Youngman, Thomas H. Segars, Raleigh, for NCICL. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of September 2006 by Amicus (NCICL) for Leave to Participate in Oral Argument as Amicus Curiae: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of September 2006." Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
